title: **JULY MOVE-IN LOWER ALLSTON FULLY RENOVATED 4BED/2 BATH-PARKING INCLD
map_address: Franklin St near N Harvard St
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE JULY/AUGUST 1ST 2022!', '2 OFF-STREET PARKING SPACES INCLUDED!', 'A very large, and gut-renovated 4 bedroom/2 bathroom rental apartment.', ' The unit is located in a professionally managed multi0family that is just steps to Harvard Business School, North Harvard St, Western Ave, Storrow Drive, I-90, Harvard Square, and multiple MBTA routes!', ' Unit features include high-end finishes throughout, granite countertops, stainless appliances, hardwood floors, central AIR, an in-unit washer/dryer, and 2 off-street parking spaces included in the rent price.', ' No pets and no undergraduate students.', 'Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'BenC @ <URL>', 'Ben Carroll of Benjamin Apartments & Cityside Homes', 'Real Estate Professional', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments at <URL>", 'Transportation', 'Bus: 64 Cambridge St @ Lincoln St (0.32 mi)', 'Rail: Framingham/Worcester Line Boston Landing (0.47 mi)', 'Bus: 66 N Harvard St @ Franklin St (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Western Ave @', 'Riverdale St (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 70 Western Ave @ N Harvard St (0.23 mi)']
